tariff_item: Up to ${tariff} requests per month - ${price} USD
inc_tariff_message: Your current plan of «Up to ${current_tariff} products per month» will be canceled and the plan of «Up to ${next_tariff} products per month» will be provided upon confirmation. ${price} will be deducted from your balance.
inc_balance_message: There are not enough funds in your balance to change the current tariff plan to «Up to ${next_tariff} products per month». The recommended amount for top-up is ${price}
dec_tariff_message: The current tariff plan «Up to ${current_tariff} products per month» will be changed to the tariff plan «Up to ${next_tariff} products per month» ${date} At the time of activation, the number of published product items must comply with the new tariff plan. The excess will be removed automatically.
dec_tariff_message_2: The transition to the tariff plan «Up to ${next_tariff} products per month» will take place on ${date}
change_tariff_message: Change the tariff plan to «Up to ${next_tariff} products per month»?
payment_operation_2: Write-off from the balance for the tariff
payment_operation_4: Write-off from royal bonus and credit to balance
payment_operation_5: Crediting royal bonuses to your balance
payment_operation_10: The tariff «Up to ${nextTariff} products per month» has been started
back_to_current_tariff: Return to the current tariff plan
need_up_to_balance: To activate immediately, you need to top up the balance
up_to_balance: To activate the tariff plan, top up your balance
